testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say

items.name: Emma Roberts
items.comment: I couldn't believe how quickly my wobbly travel videos transformed into smooth clips. Fantastic tool!

items.name: Lucas Peterson
items.comment: As a sports videographer, WaveSpeed has become essential for my projects. It saves so much time!

items.name: Jessica Lee
items.comment: I love that my videos stay private and secure during processing. Highly recommend!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about video stabilization

items.title: What types of videos can be stabilized?
items.description: WaveSpeed AI can stabilize all types of videos, including action shots, travel clips, and home videos, effectively smoothing out any unwanted motion.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed completely free to use?
items.description: Absolutely! Enjoy daily credits to stabilize your videos without charge, with options to earn more through community engagement.

items.title: Can I use my stabilized videos for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes, users with a subscription can use stabilized content commercially. Free users may only use content for personal projects.

items.title: How does the privacy protection work?
items.description: Our AI processes videos directly in your browser, ensuring that no data is sent to external servers, safeguarding your privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Smooth Out Your Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI today and witness the magic of instant stabilization. No sign-up required.
